level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 201(a)(2) of Anacostia Waterfront Corporation Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-586, November 1, 2004, 51 DCR 10681).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-144, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1219.01.
For D.C. Law 13-312, see notes following § 2-1217.01.
For D.C. Law 15-219, see notes following § 2-1219.19.
